title: Tie, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: bobbin lace, Chantilly style
provenance: Donor states that most of these pieces belonged to Mrs. Caroline Low Pierce of Brooklyn and Riverside, CT.
description: Narrow black lace band in a conventionalized flower and leaf design. A medallion at either end shows a quartered shield, each quarter with a flower surrounded by leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tie, 19th century.Medium: silk
Technique: bobbin lace, Chantilly style. 1946-40-9.
